text: Bas-Intyamon is a municipality of the district Gruyère in the canton of Fribourg in Switzerland. It was created on 1 January 2004, by the former municipalities of Enney, Estavannens and Villars-sous-Mont merged to form Bas- Intyamon.Amtliches Gemeindeverzeichnis der Schweiz published by the Swiss Federal Statistical Office accessed 19 July 2011 == References == ==Other websites== Category:Municipalities in Gruyère
title: Bas-Intyamon
